page.title: 07FARMLAND
page.content: {FARMLAND; THE DUNSMORE AREA The agricultural land on the grid is mainly situated in the valley which runs along the dip slope of the Chilterns bordering the main London_Aylesbury road. There is also farm land to the West of Coombe Hill, which includes Dropshot Field which is an 100_acre field. The land is mainly divided into small farms. Much of the area is pasture and grazing land for sheep, horses and cattle. The main crops produced from the arable land are Wheat and Barley. Some of the land at Russell Farm off the A413 has been sold to provide land for small businesses. An example of this is the Emerald Conifer Nurseries which has expanded rapidly over the last five years. It now has a large selection of conifers and shrubs for sale.
